description: This table holds the note about a required attachment received from the payer for an electronic prior authorization action.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ATTACHMENT_NOTES
columns.description: This item holds the note with information on what is required in the attachment for the question set.
